Most Illustrious and Excellent Sir

By virtue of the orders from Your Excellency Lieutenant Isaías with 24 men to surprise a guard of rebels said to be in Boa Vista, I am spending this night with the rest of the men on the other side to carry out the orders of Your Excellency Juca Custódio, who is around the Cerro da Fortaleza and Santa Cruz with more than 20 men.

This is what I have to report to Your Excellency for now.

God preserve Your Excellency. Santo Amaro, June 13, 1840. Most Illustrious and Excellent Sir Manuel Jorge Rodrigues, Lieutenant-General Commander-in-Chief of the Army. Francisco Pedro de Abreu. Lieutenant-Colonel.
